  • 03 Jan 2014 » About me

    It would seem that most people start with an “about me” page so why should this be any different. I am Graham Arden and I live in North Wales with Melissa. We have three children: Tom who is currently working in Australia, Caitlin who is studying in Bristol and our youngest Ffion who is studying at Llysfasi College, near Ruthin.
